attributes.additional_details: As the Dangerous Dogs Act is based on what certain dog breeds look like not about how they are bred/raised. Licensing to own an animal would also help prevent other animal problems.
attributes.background: Abolish the Dangerous Dogs Act and instead make it the law to have a license to own an animal

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509

Only part of the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 relates to specific breeds of dog, but if you want the whole Act to be repealed we could accept a petition requesting this. You can view this legislation here: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1991/65/contents
